transcript.text: Shalom this is Daniel John Lee with tor
restoration ministries I just got an
email from Jackie Hunt which was one of
the two ladies that came to meet with me
on Shabbat and her email she sent to me
into the whole cornerstone list
including Pastor Rick and elder Dale and
her email was very very evil
it was very wicked she basically was
trying to say we just need to all get
along and have unity and just have peace
and that's what Jesus wants bla bla bla
and I quoted to her Matthew 10 which
says Yahshua came not to bring peace but
a sword
to divide a father against his son a
daughter against his mother that
Yahshua's come to bring division a
righteous division which in this case
definitely applies because pastor rick
is an unrepentant sin he needs to be
pressed and pressed and pressed until he
either humbles himself and repents or he
leaves his position as pastor because
right now he's an unrepentant sin so
he's not fit to be a pastor
and again the sin he's engaged in is a
violation of 1st corinthians 6 or he's
going to law against other believers
jacqui then respond to that said oh well
have a great life you know let's just
have all peace bla bla bla so I'm here
again issuing a proclamation to
Cornerstone any person who's aware of
Rick's sin which is most of you because
I've been sending these emails out for
quite a while and making these videos
but any of you who are aware that Pastor
Rick is currently an unrepentant sin
which he is if you continue to go to
Cornerstone his sin will be upon your
head and you too will go to the lake of
fire unless you leave Cornerstone and
you must leave Cornerstone you must stop
attending that wicked cursed church
until this pastor humbles himself and
repents so you want to continue going to
Cornerstone Jackie Hunt and Jill and all
you others guess what you're gonna go to
the lake of fire and perish forever and
be tormented age to age a little some
daughter Giada age unto age will be
tormented if you don't repent and leave
Cornerstone come out of her my people
says yeah show of Nazareth I'm speaking
by the Holy Spirit's by the ruach
ha'qodesh by his blood by Yosh of
Nazareth leave Cornerstone or you will
be thrust into the lake of fire
leave Cornerstone and do not return
until Pastor Rick humbles himself and
repents of his gross and sick sin
this is apostle Daniel John Lee Shalom
